sentences.en: A changing world has put pressures on the company.
sentences.cn: 日新月异的世界使这家公司感到了压力。

sentences.en: A skeleton staff of 20 is being kept on.
sentences.cn: 留下了20名骨干人员。

sentences.en: a store on Fifth Avenue
sentences.cn: 第五大道上的一家商店

sentences.en: As I sidestepped, the bottle hit me on the left hip.
sentences.cn: 我侧一步要躲闪的时候，瓶子打中了我的左髋部。

sentences.en: Eventually, you'll learn to cry that on the inside.
sentences.cn: 终有一天，你会学会让泪往心里流。

sentences.en: He did not like to be caught out on details.
sentences.cn: 他不喜欢在细节上被人抓住把柄。

sentences.en: He got out of bed and pulled on his bathrobe.
sentences.cn: 他起床后穿上了晨衣。

sentences.en: He grew up on a ranch in California.
sentences.cn: 他在加利福尼亚的一个牧场里长大。

sentences.en: He was carrying on about some stupid television series.
sentences.cn: 他喋喋不休地说着某个无聊的电视连续剧。

sentences.en: Husband and wife are now taxed separately on their incomes.
sentences.cn: 现在夫妻双方分别按各自的收入纳税。

sentences.en: I know how to darn, and how to sew a button on.
sentences.cn: 我会打补丁，缝纽扣。

sentences.en: I wanted to punch him on the nose.
sentences.cn: 我真想一拳打到他鼻子上。

sentences.en: Is there a water supply on the island?
sentences.cn: 岛上有供水吗？

sentences.en: Matt kissed her on the cheek.
sentences.cn: 马特亲吻了她的脸颊。

sentences.en: On Sunday Cohen lay around the house all day.
sentences.cn: 科恩星期天一整天都在家无所事事。

sentences.en: Put a pan of salted water on to boil.
sentences.cn: 将一锅盐水放上去煮。

sentences.en: She planted a kiss on each of his leathery cheeks.
sentences.cn: 她在他粗糙的面颊上左右各吻了一下。

sentences.en: She went directly to Simon's apartment and knocked on the door.
sentences.cn: 她直奔西蒙的房间，敲了敲门。

sentences.en: she's always on about doing one's duty.
sentences.cn: 她总是滔滔不绝地谈尽义务。

sentences.en: The cold, misty air felt wonderful on his face.
sentences.cn: 雾蒙蒙，寒冷的空气使他脸上感觉很舒爽。

sentences.en: The town is right on the border.
sentences.cn: 这个城镇就在边境上。

sentences.en: they went up on to the ridge.
sentences.cn: 他们爬上了屋脊。

sentences.en: we got on to the train.
sentences.cn: 我们上了火车。

sentences.en: You'll need to get on the right side of Carmela.
sentences.cn: 你得讨卡梅拉的欢心。

sentences.en: You'll never deceive us again; we're on to you.
sentences.cn: 你再也骗不了我们了；我们已识破了你的诡计

words.tran_cn: 在从事...中的,在发生着的
处于...情况中的,起着作用的

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)几乎发现某人的非法行径
知道，意识到：意识到…或知道…的情况
(非正式)这是不实际（或无法接受）的
(非正式)（表示惊奇）你吃错药啦？

trans.tran_en: used to say what part of someone or something is hit or touched

trans.tran_cn: 开着的；发生着的，正在进行中
trans.tran_en: used to say that something is written somewhere
used to say what part of someone or something is hit or touched

trans.tran_cn: （表示方向）向，（表示对象）对，（表示位置）在…上，（表示时间）在…之时
trans.tran_en: used to say what part of someone or something is hit or touched
